title: Recipient mail adresse autocompletion/proposition without adressbook
content:
Hello there, I'm using/testing Thunderbird for Android since few month now. I'm very happy with it, i come from BlueMail which is already great but I was not happy with the efficiency of the push notification system. I was missing a lot of emails. Anyway, i decided to try Thunderbird and it solved all my problems.

But, I have a blocking problem using Thunderbird for Android : When I write a new email and I write the adress mail of the recipient(s), the app doesnt propose any autocompletion/email adress based on emails i recieved/sent. The only way to have this is to have contacts in my adress book which I don't want. This is a feature BlueMail had so I uess it should be possible to have such equivalent with thunderbird ? Does anyone knows ?

Thanks a lot :) Best, N
creator: nyckslyder

title: lost access to my Google calendar
content: This morning, I discovered that I can no longer add items to my Google calendar and that any new items added on my phone did not sync. I tried uninstalling the Google Provider addon and then tried to resinstall it. However, I'm getting "Bad Gateway" error for the addons site. Having read a couple of articles I then tried to add my Google calendar as a network calendar and Google accepted the request but Thunderbird reports that my "credentials were not accepted" - despite the fact the Google sent me an email saying that Thunderbird now had full access to my calendar. Do I need the "Provider" addon? If so, where do I get it and why did it stop working?
creator: stephenatkins7215

title: Get mail only downloads in batches
content:
Hi, I am using the latest version of Thunderbird, connected to three Gmail accounts (two are POP3, one is IMAP). I usually load up thunderbird once a week to backup all emails from Gmail. The problem is when I click the get new mail button it only downloads emails in batches of 14 or 20. I have to keep clicking the get new mail button to download all the weeks emails. I cannot find any setting to change this behaviour. I just want thunderbird to download all emails in one go. Is this a Gmail issue or thunderbird issue? Thanks in advance

James

title: How I remove the reply button when viewing newsgroups
content:
It is annoying as when I reply to a Newsgroup I instinctively hit reply rather than Followup. It also happens to be the first button in the list compounding the issue. Thankfully my default newsgroup email address is invalid so my reply doesn't go to the victims email account.

Some years ago I managed to remove this button, presumably with an Addon that no longer works. Are there any Addons that still work?

Due to issues with Thunderbird and starting in troubleshoot mode this has undone the removal of this button.

Can anyone give me a clue how I can remove this troublesome button?
creator: thunderbird2

title: Messages can be sent, but a network error message appears, informing that the message has been sent but not saved.
content:
I have an intriguing problem. I am using the latest version, currently 128.8.1 (automatic update), Windows 11 is also updated. Desktop computer, Ethernet connection, network speed 900mbps.

I use 10 accounts in the program, most of the time the program connects only to gmail accounts, and IMAP accounts from other providers are constantly being connected. Sometimes hours pass until a new message appears in the program (there is no message download, simply, the other accounts are as if without updates). Messages can be sent, but a network error message appears, informing that the message has been sent but not saved.

I know that the mail arrives because I use a different device, I only have the problem on this equipment.

Drivers are up to date, Thunderbird reinstalled, started in maintenance mode, database re-indexed. Nothing helps.

Any ideas? Thanks!
creator: podhalanin

title: Search on Sent folder only working when troubleshoot mode
content:
I am able to use quick search on all of my folders EXCEPT the Sent folder and it's sub folders.

Example: When in the Inbox, I type part of someone's email and I see all the emails with that as part of the email address. BUT, when I do this for the SENT folder and any of the sub folders and nothing comes up. Even folks that I email several times a day it does not find them

When I put Thunderbird into Troubleshoot mode, the quick search works.

Another issue is when doing a global search for all folders, I will see something in sent, but when I click on it, Thunderbird does not find the email. This happens with the SENT folder only.

I have tried a few solutions, including rebuilding the Global Database and making sure this folder is part of that.

what am I missing?

Thanks for any help Chris
creator: chriswcabral

I need HELP

title: Can't close/delete calendar notifications
content:
In Thunderbird 128.8.1esr (32-bit) Danish language version, on Windows 10, when a list of past notifications pops up, I cannot close them. Whether I use "Turn off" individual notifications one by one, or "Turn all off", nothing happens, except the first time I try, I can see at the bottom left of the screen that communication takes place with the server. But the notification doesn't disappear. On following attempts, nothing happens at all, until I restart Thunderbird, then again I get a long list of notifications from the past that have never been turned off.

As for individual notifications popping up at the scheduled time, I can mostly, but not always, turn them off.

The calendars are no google servers. The problem started occurring 2-3 months ago.

What to do?

title: Suspicious failure of Thunderbird connection to Google calendar
content:
Two days ago I got a suspicious message in the form of a window that opened on my Firefox browser, purportedly from the author of Google Calendar Provider, soliciting contributions. Not expecting the window, and not certain of its authenticity I closed it.

Yesterday my calendar failed by popping up two notifications from my Google calendar via Thunderbird. I could not dismiss them. Other users have occasionally noted this issue. I tried closing and opening Thunderbird and rebooting. The alerts persisted.

So I removed the Google calendar from Thunderbird. The alerts went away. Hooray!

But when I reinstalled my Google calendar through Calendar Provider, the calendar showed up on the list of calendars, but non of its events appeared. Synchronization, closing Thunderbird, and rebooting did not help.

I can't tell whether I was hit by some kind of e-blackmail (pay up or else), or if something changed in Thunderbird, or what. No antivirus measures have been triggered, and my Windows 11 system is set up as a local account without administrative privileged. I am up to date on Windows updates. Running Thunderbird 128.8.1 esr
creator: La_Sombra

creator: jwillard433

title: Zmena hesla na IMAP účte google imap.gmail.com
content:
Dobrý deň. V thunderbirde obsluhujem viac účtov na imap.gmail.com Všetko fungovalo dlhé roky OK až do okamihu, keď som cez WEB gmailu zmeni heslo k jednomu účtu. Zobrazí sa okno na Oauth2 prihlásenie https://accounts.google.com/_/bscframe s predvyplnenýmúčtom Google. Okno sa zdá OK, ale keď kliknem na ĎALEJ aby sa zobrazilokno s výzvou na zadanie hesla, tak to vráti chybu 400 bez bližších detailov. Keď link https://accounts.google.com/v3/signin/identifier?app_domain=http://localhost&client_id=40696465 atd vložím do anonymného okna firefoxu, tak sa zobrazí také isté okno a po klik na ďalší zas zhavaruje, akurát s chybou 500. Aj v Chrome. Na mobile s Aquamail prebehne zmena hesla správnym spôsobom. Zmazal som v TB uložené heslá pre daný účet a nepomohlo. Zmazal som uložené heslá pre iný google účte a i keď som heslo nemenil, tak som skončil s rovnakým problémom... Účet som z TB odstránil (bez zmazania dat) a znovu pridal a nedostal som sa zas cez heslo... Keď sa dívam cez WEB na správu gmail účtu, tak v Aplikácie a služby tretích strán le len aquamail a nie Thunderbird. Vo funkčných účtoch mám aj TB. Dokonca i v tom druhom, ktorému som zmazal heslá, ale nezmenil. Tiež sa nemôže autorizovať ale TB v aplik 3 strán je...

Mám najnovší TB 115.18.1.esr

Pomooooooc :-(
creator: martin180
